page.title: 11Trade and services - Rode.
page.content: Rode has 4 shops: a bakery and grocery, a general store, a sub-post office selling stationery and a fabric shop. A bank visits weekly and the County Mobile Library calls fortnightly. Mobile shops sell fresh fish, meat, greengrocery and fish and chips. Milk is delivered every day except Sunday. There are window cleaning and laundry services. The following run businesses from home: 3 builders, 2 decorators, a plumber, an antique clock repairer, a civil engineering contractor,an electrican, 2 caterers. There are also 2 bed and breakfast establishments and a newspaper delivery service. The village has a garage and a filling station, which also sells and services garden machinery, 3 public houses and a restaurant. Rode's largest employer is the brewery depot.
